body:
@carlosantoniodasilva i'm in the same boat, i've needed this in a few projects though, so though I would throw it against the wall and see if it stuck - so to speak. There are a number of external libraries that essentially do the same thing:

- [Retriable](https://rubygems.org/gems/retriable)
- [Retry](https://rubygems.org/gems/retry)
- [retry_this](https://rubygems.org/gems/retry-this)

Though i'll bet the majority of people who need this [write it themselves](http://www.allenwei.cn/tips-how-to-write-ruby-retry/) or find out how to on [Stack Overflow](http://stackoverflow.com/questions/1746177/ruby-how-to-know-if-script-is-on-3rd-retry) (accepted answer voted up 10 times). It would be nice to have this functionality out of the box.
